name: image-map-creator
description: This is a simple map creator tool made with the p5.js library. I want it to be easy to use for both the end user and the developper.

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --tag-version-prefix= && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --tag-version-prefix= && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major --tag-version-prefix= && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:publish: export TAG=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) && npm run dist && git push && git push --tags && gh release create $TAG && gh release upload $TAG dist/*.js && npm publish
